1.details:
1. Debug React authentication errors causing login failures
2. Implement proper authentication state management
3. Add error handling and user feedback for failed logins
4. Test with demo credentials (demo@restaurantbook.com / password123)
5. Ensure authentication persists across page refreshes

2.details:
1. Fix bottom navigation button click handlers in mobile PWA
2. Resolve 'Could not get position' errors for navigation elements [42-45]
3. Test navigation across different mobile viewport sizes
4. Ensure PWA mobile experience works properly
5. Add proper routing for mobile navigation

3.details:
1. Debug and resolve React errors #418 and #423 causing application breakdown
2. Implement React error boundaries to prevent complete failures
3. Add fallback UI for when components fail to render
4. Ensure all routes (/login, /register, /profile, /bookings) work correctly
5. Test application stability across multiple deployments

4.details:
1. Identify and fix 20+ failed image loads affecting visual appeal
2. Resolve restaurant image loading issues
3. Fix app icon loading problems (calendar icons, etc.)
4. Implement fallback images for failed loads
5. Optimize image delivery and paths

5.details:
1. Deploy fixed application with all critical issues resolved
2. Conduct comprehensive testing of authentication and navigation
3. Test mobile PWA experience across different devices
4. Verify search functionality works properly
5. Generate deployment report and provide user access credentials
